attributes.action: Help stop the suffering and daily bombardment within Syria
attributes.additional_details:
A five-day-long bombardment by Syrian government forces is reported to have killed more than 300 civilians in the rebel-held Eastern Ghouta area.

These children are part of the human cost.

https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews/videos/10155600946997217/
attributes.background:
Help stop the suffering in Syria
We ask the UK Government to use its international powers to end the deliberate targeting of civilians and civilian infrastructure in Syria, negotiate access routes with Turkey and other countries which could help for medics and medical supplies to Syria.
